mapper.insert: insert into book (title, author, publisher, summary, status, isAvailable, release_date, rent_date, category_id) values (#{title}, #{author}, #{publisher}, #{summary}, #{status}, #{isAvailable}, #{release_date}, #{rent_date}, #{category.category_id})
